page.title: 02SOUTH LEEDS.
page.content: {LIFE IN 1985 { LIFE IN 1985 IS GETTING {MORE AND MORE ADVANCED ALL THE TIME. {OVER THE PAST CENTURY MORE MACHINERY {HAS BEEN INVENTED TO MAKE LIFE IN THE {FUTURE EASIER THAN IT HAS BEEN. {E.G { MACHINERY LIKE ? { {1. CARS AND MOTOR VEHICLES. {2. ADVANCED INDUSTRIAL MACHINERY. {3. OUTER SPACE PROJECTS. {4. NUCLEAR DISARMLIMENT. { { MANY OF THESE EXAMPLES LISTED {ABOVE HAVE BEEN MADE BETTER AND BETTER {OVER THE PAST CENTURY TO HELP LIFE IN {1985 AND THE NEAR FUTURE EASY { { BY MICHELLE LEE { AND WENDY PATON.
